verses.text: Bow \w down|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me: for I \add am\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*.\f + \fr 86.1 \ft A Prayerâ€¦: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of David\f*

\w Preserve|strong="H8104"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; for I \add am\add* \w holy|strong="H2623"\w*: O thou my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in thee.\f + \fr 86.2 \ft holy: or, one whom thou favourest\f*
Be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*: for I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto thee \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 86.3 \ft daily: or, all the day\f*

\w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: for unto thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, do I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

For thou, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \add art\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and ready to \w forgive|strong="H5546"\w*; and \w plenteous|strong="H7227"\w* in \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto all them that \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon thee.

Give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, unto my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*; and \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*.
In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon thee: for thou wilt \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* me.
Among the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \add there is\add* none like unto thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*; neither \add are there any works\add* like unto thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.

All \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whom thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*; and shall \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.
For thou \add art\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* wondrous \w things|strong="H6381"\w*: thou \add art\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* alone.

\w Teach|strong="H3384"\w* me thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; I will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: \w unite|strong="H3161"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, with all my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: and I will \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.

For \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* toward me: and thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w lowest|strong="H8482"\w* \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*.\f + \fr 86.13 \ft hell: or, grave\f*

O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* are \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* against me, and the \w assemblies|strong="H5712"\w* of \w violent|strong="H6184"\w* \add men\add* have \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* after my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; and have not \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thee before them.\f + \fr 86.14 \ft violent: Heb. terrible\f*

But thou, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \add art\add* a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* full of \w compassion|strong="H7349"\w*, and \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, \w longsuffering|strong="H0750"\w*, and \w plenteous|strong="H7227"\w* in \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

O \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* unto me, and have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me; \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*.

\w Shew|strong="H6213"\w* me a \w token|strong="H0226"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; that they which \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me may \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: because thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, hast \w holpen|strong="H5826"\w* me, and \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* me.
